p: Ahlgren and Hyenstrand (2003) and Hoffmann et al. (2010) reported that under nitrogen-deficient conditions, algal cells often accumulate a surplus of carbon metabolites as neutral lipids more than polar lipids. It was also reported that microalgae respond to the nitrogen starvation condition by degrading nitrogen-containing macromolecules and accumulating carbon reserve compounds for the maintenance of cells, such as lipids.
